channel.title: I ancients i help thread!
channel.description:
ok..here are a list of things you might have questions for.. This is the list of sources for your server
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,122377.0.html
This is jdku1, select download jdku1 select accept,check the box under windows offline installation then scroll to bottom and download..
This is for setting up a no-ip
http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
Mod tharoks perfect compiler
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49747.0.html
Link to making a server by: the guardian
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,134771.0.html
okay, if none of the above helps you post here and i will try to help you as best i can

item.title: I ancients i help thread!
item.dc:creator: @i_ancients_i i ancients i
item.description:
@i_ancients_i wrote:

[quote=“drakeness-scape, post:2, topic:111186”]where do you put commands in testscape? can u post the code where id add it under? i want to add this cone [code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("::pker")){ //Voule Command Generator
addItem(4224,1);
addItem(4720,1);
addItem(4722,1);
addItem(6570,1);
addItem(4151,1);
addItem(1044,1);

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has been decked out with pk gear out ;)";
}
[/code][/quote] you used the command.bat to make the command, correct?

Read full topic
